name: Deasy Labs
headline: Metadata for GenAI workflows
description:
Deasy Labs provides metadata orchestration for AI workflows. Deasie's platform provides the best way for AI teams to create and embed high-quality, customized metadata into their AI workflows (e.g., RAG, Agentic frameworks).

Our three founders (from Amazon, McKinsey/QuantumBlack & MIT) previously built an ML data governance tool from 0 to 1 within McKinsey, which we deployed with 11 Fortune 500 companies. We saw in early 2023 the ability to create high-quality metadata (without reliance on domain experts) would be a key factor in achieving the accuracy & speed in GenAI applications required for production.  

Our investors include General Catalyst, Y Combinator, RTP Global and world experts in enterprise data. Website: https://deasylabs.com

founders.name: Reece Griffiths, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of Deasie: Data governance for language models in the enterprise. 

Prior experience: QuantumBlack: Product Manager for AI for Data Governance product (1.5 yrs); McKinsey & Company: Management consultant (2 yrs); X26: Founder of X26 (global entrepreneurs community); University of Cambridge: Masters in information engineering. Personal blog: https://reecewgriffiths.com

founders.name: Mikko Peiponen, Founder
founders.description: Mikko is the co-founder of Deasie. He is a technologist with deep experience (5+ years) in data and machine learning space from McKinsey and QuantumBlack, where he implemented and deployed models at large enterprises. Prior to moving into the world of data governance for language models with Deasie, he was the Lead data scientist building AI data quality tool at QuantumBlack. Mikko holds a graduate degree from MIT.

founders.name: Leonard Platzer, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of Deasie: Data governance for unstructured data. 

Prior experience: QuantumBlack: Software Engineer, Machine Learning at AI for Data Quality product; Previous Engineer at Amazon, Mercedes-Benz and ChatBot Startup (E-Bot 7); Bachelor from National University of Singapore and Graduate from UWC Mostar

[How it Works](https://www.deasylabs.com/</how-it-works>)[Blog](https://www.deasylabs.com/</blog>)[About Us](https://www.deasylabs.com/</about-us>)[Careers](https://www.deasylabs.com/</careers>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/65456087df5823449ba4ac1e_Menu.svg)[Request Demo](https://www.deasylabs.com/</request-a-demo>)

# [Metadata for AI workflows](https://www.deasylabs.com/<https:/www.deasie.com/>)
Deasy Labs provides the best way to create and leverage metadata within your AI workflows
[Request Demo](https://www.deasylabs.com/</request-a-demo>)
## How leading enterprises use Deasy Labs' metadata workflow:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/667ca26826b6d88a908acbec_database-02.svg)
### Direct connection to vector embeddings
We connect to any vector database and can generate metadata from both (i) embeddings or (ii) underlying documents 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/667ca4206f5dd598b30d8102_arrow-turn-forward.svg)
### Auto-suggested metadata from your data
We model backward engineers the best metadata schema from your corpus of documents
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/667ca42bde3416f39361208a_remove-circle.svg)
### Generate best-in-class multi-modal metadata at scale
We extract metadata at both chunk & document level, which is hierarchical, multi-modal and standardized
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/667ca43810ff639a8ea9eb43_sparkles.svg)
### Use metadata for agent or node selection with our retrieval agent 
Our retrieval agent uses the metadata to select the most relevant information and agents
## Trusted by Leading Enterprises
Deasy Labs' metadata tagging solution for unstructured data has profoundly transformed our enterprise's knowledge management landscape. Their speed has allowed us to test the viability of our in-house AI product far quicker than expected, with their data preparation capability playing a critical step in the product workflow.
![Sam Grice, CEO of Octopus Legacy \(Financial Group\)](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/668314b998503cf7f4b876ca_Sam%20Grice.jpg)
Sam Grice
CEO of Octopus Legacy (Financial Group)
Deasy Labs' industry leading data governance and labeling capabilities have been invaluable in allowing us to achieve transformational automation and top line growth with speed to value, accuracy and reliability. Their team has been top notch in their technical and problem solving capabilities to enable this.
![Beth Pollack, Applied AI and Data Strategy Operating Partner at Decision Science Advisors](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/668dab371518f84db66c9cd6_1686862710049.jpg)
Beth Pollack
Applied AI and Data Strategy Operating Partner, Decision Science Advisors
Developed by **award-winning** team in enterprise software for **AI and data governance.**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654554933f873db843c9deff_Amazon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/65467fed2a1b5bd337407642_McKinsey%20%26%20Company.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654554c4ad38129c946962c6_Quantum%20Black.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654554b667912fec337ae87d_MIT.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/6545562829cd9bdf44d35e42_nus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654559403893da2f4f6f5ac2_cambridge.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654554d099cc72f10c2aac92_Mercedes-Benz.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654554933f873db843c9deff_Amazon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654554c4ad38129c946962c6_Quantum%20Black.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654554b667912fec337ae87d_MIT.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/6545562829cd9bdf44d35e42_nus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654559403893da2f4f6f5ac2_cambridge.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654554d099cc72f10c2aac92_Mercedes-Benz.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/65467fed2a1b5bd337407642_McKinsey%20%26%20Company.svg)
## "What didn’t exist was a good approach for measuring data quality and relevance for unstructured data … Nobody was directly solving the issue of matching every generative AI use case with the ‘best’ possible set of data. Deasy Labs has developed novel approaches in this domain."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/657cfc38bcb648163f654a52_TechCrunch-logo%201.svg)
## How it Works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/667db0f509bf7b7861c8d303_Vector-how-it-works.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/667db02e739dad026b01b8c8_how-it-works-background.png)
### Define metadata
Auto-suggested metadataWe analyse large document & image sets to auto-suggest the most relevant metadata for your use case
Customisable metadataWe enable anyone to easily define new metadata through LLM-powered labelling
Hierarchical metadataWe infer relationships between documents to build hierarchical metadata
### Improve metadata
Auto-standardisedAutomatic standardisation and grouping of similar metadata values to enable easy filtering and updates
Intelligently validatedHuman-in-the-loop validation workflow to test, analyse and refine metadata through reinforcement learning
TraceableQuality scores & evidence generated for all metadata to provide easy validation
### Utilize metadata
Export & integrate‍Direct connection of metadata back into underlying vector databases
Retrieve Intelligent selection and filtering of the most relevant pieces of information
Maintain metadata ‍Continuous & automated maintenance of metadata, including dynamic taxonomies
## Hierarchical metadata
Deasy Labs auto-detects relationships between metadata labels in order to build a hierarchical representation of the unstructured dataset. Hierarchical labels enable more efficient labelling, insight generation, and can be exported to enhance retrieval sequencing in AI applications.
[Request Demo](https://www.deasylabs.com/</request-a-demo>)
![Diagram showing inferred hierarchy of metadata labels, including relationships between labels such as customer complaint, complaint type, general enquiry, and related factors like wait time and services used.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/66846030fd4b8941c26cfb55_rag-ilus.png)
## Built for seamlessenterprise deployment
Integrate with any data source (e.g., Sharepoint, S3, AzureBlob, Teams, Dropbox, … )
Deploy on-prem within your private cloud
Use Deasie as a platform or API''
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/667ee92cf8667c5e3ef65954_deasie-logo-light.png)
Easy import and export of metadata to connect with your existing data systems & MDM tools
Auto-label tens of thousands of documents in rapid succession
Manage user permissions and controls
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/667daf8148f51797bf67c00c_right-arrows.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/667dae2eea5acbb4bde799d0_left-arrows.svg)
## Download our report on the role of metadata in AI
Most companies are yet to realise the importance that high-quality metadata labels will play in the upcoming era of AI deployment. Download our report to get an in-depth analysis on the impact that metadata can have on building safe, scalable and accurate LLM applications.
[Download Report](https://www.deasylabs.com/</download-report>)
![AI Deployment Report by Deasy Labs available for download, covering the role of metadata in AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/67093ec425c0a3ebce57f52e_Group%2043075%402x.png)
## Request a Demo
Discover how your team can leverage Deasy Labs to productionize your AI workflows with metadata. Once you complete the request form, a team member will reach out within 24-48 business hours.
[Request Demo](https://www.deasylabs.com/</request-a-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/65527fee7fee5fcd4fb62017_Footer-Data.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/65528049de3b822d1b126424_Footer-Data-Green.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654011f0899a8acc633fbcf3/654665c0f033546e8f512d9a_Deasie-Shrimp.svg)
© 2024 Deasy Labs
[Terms of Service](https://www.deasylabs.com/<http:/www.deasie.com/terms-of-service>)[Privacy Policy](https://www.deasylabs.com/<https:/app.termly.io/document/privacy-policy/00b10cd4-022b-4fc3-991f-7ed6a3a86fd7>)[Cookie Policy](https://www.deasylabs.com/<https:/app.termly.io/document/cookie-policy/78cc3386-9332-48c8-a90c-074b4f642a7a>)[DSAR](https://www.deasylabs.com/<https:/app.termly.io/notify/00b10cd4-022b-4fc3-991f-7ed6a3a86fd7>)

generated_description:
Deasy Labs is carving out a crucial niche in the burgeoning landscape of generative AI by focusing on metadata orchestration for AI workflows. Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S23, the company was birthed from the experiences of three founders who previously built a machine learning data governance tool at McKinsey from the ground up. They deployed this tool with 11 Fortune 500 companies, which provided them keen insights into the importance of high-quality metadata in enhancing AI applications.

The mission here is straightforward: empower teams to seamlessly create and integrate customized metadata into their workflows—think RAG and Agentic frameworks. By eliminating the need for constant reliance on domain experts, Deasy Labs aims to optimize the accuracy and speed necessary for production in generative AI.

Their platform offers several standout features:

1. **Direct Connection to Vector Embeddings**: It interfaces with any vector database, allowing metadata generation from embeddings or underlying documents.
2. **Auto-Suggested Metadata**: Leveraging sophisticated models to derive the most relevant metadata schema from a set of documents.
3. **Multi-Modal Metadata at Scale**: Extracting metadata from both chunks and entire documents in a way that's both hierarchical and standardized.
4. **Intelligent Information Retrieval**: Their system utilizes metadata for efficient agent or node selection, ensuring that users access the right information when it matters most.

The confidence in Deasy Labs is echoed by their clientele. Companies like Octopus Legacy and Decision Science Advisors highlight the transformative impact of the platform on automating processes and accelerating time-to-value.

Backed by credible investors such as General Catalyst, Y Combinator, and RTP Global, Deasy Labs combines expertise from notable institutions like Amazon, McKinsey, and MIT. They emphasize that creating high-quality metadata efficiently is no longer a luxury; it’s an essential part of modern AI deployment strategies.

With a lean team of three, they already show promise in fundamentally changing how businesses approach data governance and operational intelligence. If you’re looking to dive deeper, check out their [website](https://www.deasylabs.com) and consider requesting a demo to see their solution in action.

Overall, Deasy Labs stands out not just because of its technological offerings, but because it addresses a critical gap in the AI landscape, ensuring teams can focus on what they do best: innovating.
